${ModID}:Imp.NAME: Imp
${ModID}:Imp.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal 4 damage to a random enemy. Increase the damage of *Imp cards by 1 this combat. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:HighPriestessJeklik.NAME: High Priestess Jeklik
${ModID}:HighPriestessJeklik.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, add 2 copies of it to your hand.

${ModID}:SoulShear.NAME: Soul Shear
${ModID}:SoulShear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle 1 *Imp into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Soulfire.NAME: Soulfire
${ModID}:Soulfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
${ModID}:Soulfire.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

${ModID}:Doomguard.NAME: Doomguard
${ModID}:Doomguard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust 2 random cards in your hand.

${ModID}:HandOfGulDan.NAME: Hand of Gul'dan
${ModID}:HandOfGulDan.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If this card is Exhausted, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:SeedsOfDestruction.NAME: Seeds of Destruction
${ModID}:SeedsOfDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Choose to shuffle !M! *Imps into your draw pile or one more into your discard pile.

${ModID}:AranasiBroodmother.NAME: Aranasi Broodmother
${ModID}:AranasiBroodmother.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile. NL When you draw this card, gain !M! Block.
